definition: behind-the-scenes story/details known only to insiders

(of taste) hot or pungent/hard/laborious/suffering/eighth in order/eighth of the ten Heavenly Stems 十天干[shi2 tian1 gan1]/letter "H" or Roman "VIII" in list "A, B, C", or "I, II, III" etc/ancient Chinese compass point: 285°/octa

sentences.english: A player on the sports team blew the whistle on the gambling scandal.
sentences.chinese: 体育队的选手检举赌博弊案的秘辛。

sentences.english: It is an anecdote never published.
sentences.chinese: 这是一个从未公布的秘辛。

sentences.english: The “secret account” gives us a very different Judas.
sentences.chinese: “秘辛”却为我们示现了一个与此完全不同的犹大。

definition: anecdote/lost or apocryphal story about famous person
sth else/a separate matter/not the same thing/with different jobs (not colleagues)/a remarkable thing/sth special/an odd thing/sth strange or incomprehensible
variant of 軼聞|轶闻[yi4 wen2]
the distant past/ancient times/antiquity/early historical times
an eccentric/odd person/person of extraordinary talent
one's life experience/one's lot/one's past history
